import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGlobalContext } from "../../context/context"; const SinglePost = ({ match }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState(""); const id = match.params.id; const { state, getPost, addComment } = useGlobalContext(); const { post } = state; React.useEffect(() => { getPost(id); }, [getPost, id]); const { user: { name, avatar }, text, } = post; return ( <> Back To Posts

{name}

{text}

{ e.preventDefault(); addComment(post._id); }} >
